input.sentences: more people showed up to the demonstration than expected .
they began their march demanding equal rights .
it was civilized although they doubted that was the way the media would portray it .
more people came up from behind to join the march .
they made speeches with megaphones demanding to be heard by the public .
output.sentences: The demonstration was about to begin.
It was a march for equal rights.
Folks of all ages, nationalities, and ethnicity participated.
Many people spoke to the crowd.
